landingPage.heroSubtitle: The most affordable and complete platform for shift management. Our ultra-intuitive, flexible, and dynamic tool is faster than ever, yet simple and without useless features. Streamline your operations and stop planning, start leading.
landingPage.featuresTitle: Everything you need, nothing you don't.
landingPage.featuresSubtitle: Quick Shift is built to be powerful yet simple. Discover how our core features can transform your daily operations.
landingPage.feature1Desc: Build and adjust schedules in seconds with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface. React to changes instantly and publish updates with a single click.
landingPage.feature2Desc: Go beyond simple scheduling. Our dashboard provides actionable insights into key metrics like shift fulfillment rates and total hours scheduled, helping you optimize staff coverage and make smarter operational decisions.
landingPage.feature3Desc: Manage all staff profiles, roles, and availability in one place. Keep your roster organized and easily accessible for faster shift assignments.
landingPage.testimonialsSubtitle: Managers and owners are saving hours every week and reducing scheduling headaches with Quick Shift.
landingPage.testimonial1Quote: Quick Shift has been a game-changer. I used to spend hours on spreadsheets. Now, I create the weekly schedule in 15 minutes. The drag-and-drop is just brilliant.
landingPage.testimonial2Quote: The dashboard gives me a clear overview of my staffing and costs without needing to pull complex reports. It helps me stay on budget and spot trends early.
landingPage.testimonial3Quote: Assigning shifts based on roles and availability used to be a constant puzzle. Quick Shift streamlined the entire process. Our staff loves the clarity.
landingPage.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that matches the size and ambitions of your business. Simple and transparent.
landingPage.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of businesses that have taken control of their staff management. Start your free trial today.
landingPage.footerDesc: The ultra-intuitive, flexible, and dynamic platform for staff scheduling.
landingPage.footer: Â© {year} Quick Shift. All rights reserved.

schedule.dragDropContent: Quickly reschedule by dragging a shift card and dropping it onto a new day. This is the fastest way to handle changes.
schedule.quickAddContent: Double-click on any empty space within a day's column to instantly open the 'Add Shift' dialog for that specific date.
schedule.multiSelectContent: Activate selection mode to choose multiple shifts. This allows you to delete them all at once, saving you clicks.
schedule.zoomContent: Cycle through Compact, Default, and Detailed views to see the information that matters most to you in the moment.
schedule.lockContent: Once your schedule is finalized, lock it to prevent accidental drags or edits. Click again to unlock and make changes.
schedule.filterContent: Use the filter bar to narrow down the displayed schedule by specific employees, roles, or departments to focus your view.

employees.viewToggleContent: Toggle between a visual grid layout and a compact list view to see your team in the way that best suits your task.
employees.quickEditContent: Click anywhere on an employee's card or row to immediately open the editor and update their details or availability.
employees.filterContent: Use the search bar and advanced filters for roles and gender to instantly locate any staff member in your roster.
employees.importContent: Save time on setup by importing your entire staff roster at once using a formatted CSV file.

settings.addItemContent: Use the 'Add' button in each panel to easily create new items like roles, locations, or absence types.
settings.hoverEditContent: Simply hover your mouse over any item in a list to reveal the edit and delete buttons for quick modifications.
